Author: fallenzeus
Text: thank you so much! and i talked to my mum about it more and i think that maybe she just needs someone (not a 16yo) to explain it to her...  my  brother told me that i don’t have an eating disorder because i’m not skinny enough, and i should just eat. he triggered me a lot but i just wanna get better :(

Author: flamingtrashmonster
Text: I’m sorry your mother acted like she did. My mother was extremely abusive toward me due to my eating disorder, and it was absolutely traumatizing. It sounds like your mom just doesn’t understand; maybe once you get to know your therapist better, they can have you both in for a session and can try to help your mom better comprehend what’s going on and why how she acted was hurtful.   And no, you won’t get sent away! It’s okay you’re not underweight; any therapist worth anything will help you and be able to see that you’re struggling.
